sub_workout_group.name: Reaction Time Training
sub_workout_group.description: Develop hand-eye coordination, reflexes, and quick decision-making through drills.

sub_workouts.name: Coin Drop Catch
sub_workouts.description: Drop a coin from eye level and try to catch it before it hits the ground.

sub_workouts.name: Tennis Ball Wall Bounce
sub_workouts.description: Throw a tennis ball at the wall and react to catch it as it rebounds unpredictably.

sub_workouts.name: Mirror Hand Reflex
sub_workouts.description: Have a partner randomly move their hand while you mirror their motion with minimal delay.

sub_workouts.name: Clap Reaction Test
sub_workouts.description: Close your eyes and clap immediately when you hear a sound cue from a partner or device.

sub_workouts.name: Drop Stick Test
sub_workouts.description: Have a partner hold a ruler or stick, drop it randomly, and try to catch it as quickly as possible.

sub_workouts.name: Reaction Light Drill
sub_workouts.description: Use an app or light source that randomly flashes, reacting by tapping or moving on cue.

sub_workouts.name: Shadowboxing with Random Calls
sub_workouts.description: Have a partner call out random numbers or moves while shadowboxing, reacting instantly.

sub_workouts.name: Peripheral Vision Reaction
sub_workouts.description: Focus straight ahead while reacting to objects moving in your peripheral vision.

sub_workouts.name: Sound Cue Jump
sub_workouts.description: Jump in place immediately when a sound cue is given, varying the timing to improve reaction time.

sub_workouts.name: Balloon Tap Challenge
sub_workouts.description: Keep a balloon in the air while tapping it only when it comes into your blind spot.

sub_workouts.name: One-Handed Catch Drill
sub_workouts.description: Throw a small object in the air and catch it with the same or opposite hand rapidly.

sub_workouts.name: Random Object Grab
sub_workouts.description: Scatter small objects on a table and react to grab one as fast as possible when called.

sub_workouts.name: Fast Finger Tap
sub_workouts.description: Tap your fingers rapidly against a surface, increasing speed and reaction time.

sub_workouts.name: Reaction Dodge
sub_workouts.description: Have a partner lightly toss objects toward you, dodging them without moving out of place.

sub_workouts.name: Pattern Change Reflex
sub_workouts.description: Perform an action (jump, squat, punch) when a pattern or signal changes unexpectedly.
